sub_title: Account Medewerker - Business Development | Waardegedreven veranderen |  Bliss state of mind 💛
summary:
‘Change’ and ‘growth’ have been 2 constants in my life and career so far.
I started my career as project coordinator at Ahold Delhaize in Brussels (BE) of which sustainable packaging was my pet peeve project. Then my partner and I started our expat adventure, now spanning 10 years.
We moved from Paris (FR) where I had my own technical undershirt business, to Dallas, TX where I joined a scaling digital marketing boutique as Chief of Staff, to NYC where I was Business Developer for a Tech Scaleup and became a mom of 2 to now The Hague (NL) where I have the opportunity to bring experience in growing and changing together at Team Bliss (www.teambliss.nl), a change management consulting company where results ánd heart are equally important.
Because that is what I learned along the way, change requires the right mindset, but in truth it requires heart. It only lasts and it is only durable if it comes from within.
The same for growth, lasting growth, is growth that comes from growing from within based on trust in yourself and the process.
With Bliss, I look forward to contributing to our mission of bringing this new way of working - a focus on both results and intrinsic growth - to 100,000 professionals in 5 years.

Do reach out if you like to chat about joining Bliss or finding out how our consultants can help with change projects at your company.

On a personal level, I am passionate about the motherhood transition and have obtained a Life Coach certificate to one day support 
moms on this journey.

Finally, because of my international experience in the USA and I cheer on our start-ups and scale-ups that want to make the jump across the pond, I am always happy to make connections should I have access to a relevant network for them.

school.name: Solvay Brussels School of Economics and Management

education.field_of_study: Applied Economic Sciences & Management: Business Engineering - Marketing Concentration

school.name: European university exchange program at ESCP Europe in Paris
UPW - Dallas: Personal Growth Seminar with Tony Robbins

projects.title: Sustainable Packaging Guidelines
projects.description: Delhaize has finished its Sustainable Packaging Guidelines for its private label assortment. These guidelines will help us to put less plastic packaging on the market and help our suppliers and buyers to determine what is a more sustainable choice.

contributors.headline: Account Medewerker - Business Development | Waardegedreven veranderen |  Bliss state of mind 💛

contributors.name: Sustainability Department of Delhaize Belgium and Delhaize Group

projects.title: Greener Packaging Award
projects.description:
Delhaize participated in and won the Greener Packaging Award 2012 with the new light-weight, reclosable packaging for its dry fruit range. Delhaize now puts 108 tonnes less plastic on the market. 

Let's see what we're coming up with for this year's Award...

contributors.headline: Account Medewerker - Business Development | Waardegedreven veranderen |  Bliss state of mind 💛

profile_positions.description:
I work in the HQ team of Bliss, a consulting agency specialized in realizing lasting change. 
As Bliss HQ'er I am active in different core processes of our organization. 
Firstly, I am a SPOC on the T-mobile account, which means I follow-up on our projects to make sure they are completed in time and on budget. 
In addition, I am part of the recruitment process of our company, for which I am specifically looking for medior and senior consulting profiles to join our Bliss community. 
Lastly, I am involved in the commercial process as gatekeeper of process improvements and restrospectives.
profile_positions.title: Business and Partnership Development

profile_positions.description:
First local based Belgian employee to develop US market for Twikit. Later formed a local team of 2, supported by the HQ team based in Antwerp, Belgium. 
Main areas of focus:
•      New Business Development, Sales Pipeline Creation and Management focused on large corporate accounts in the Auto, Fashion and Medical (Orthotics & Prosthetics) Industry
•	Pitching of Twikit at industry events: won Public Vote for best pitch at Plug & Play Retail Accelerator Finale; got Twikit nominated for a golden ticket to Entrepreneur.com next Elevator Pitch Season
•	Development of strategic partnerships. Created new +$1M opportunity in wearables and protective gear market
•	Organizing of industry events, which led to a $150k investment into Twikit
•	Coaching of new associate in sales strategy, process and communication skills. After 3 months she successfully performed C-level intro meetings and demonstrations
profile_positions.title: Business Development Director US

profile_positions.description:
Started as International SEO Project Manager and quickly transferred to Chief of staff to the President's office during transformation to a new technology service model. Areas of focus: 
• Organizational design: introduced virtual cell 'Centre of Excellence' 
• Recruitment: job profiling
• Market reach through partnerships: POC to strategic partners
• Product development: liaison with IT-department to ensure infrastructure and business requirements were met
• Stakeholder alignment: coordinator and liaison for management communication
• Account Management: strategy development towards a partnership model

Learned how important communication and leadership engagement is during times of transformation. Learned that I am most fulfilled when having a strategic impact on the most complex and urgent challenges the organization faces, supporting from problem statement to execution. Learned about the immense energetic and motivational impact it has when people can work out of their natural talents and passion and find themselves in a fitting role. Learned that a company culture that shares my personal values is a must.
profile_positions.title: VP Operations and Organizational Development / Chief of Staff to the President

profile_positions.description:
Aventi Clothing made anti-sweat stain undershirts for men. They allowed their wearers to shine in full confidence even at times of peak performance.  

Launched the business from business plan to paying customers. Developed new textile materials in partnership with the Center for Textile Innovation in Belgium. Responsible for product development, business development and strategic marketing. Coached our local marketing manager and our supplier liaison in Portugal. 

Learned first hand the A-Z of starting-up a business, how the entrepreneurial adventure is also a personal growth adventure and what it means to self fund a company.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
•	Planned and coordinated 12-week process for development of printed weekly promotions brochures. Coordinated meetings between Sales, Marketing, Logistics, and Procurement.
•	Developed Standard Operating Procedures of product promotions buying process which increased product visibility, enhanced cross-departmental cooperation, and improved meeting deadlines.
•	Performed pre-order data analysis to identify order errors and prevented inventory stock-outs of key promotional products in 400 stores.

Learned to apply commercial insights, cross-departmental alignment and seasonality thinking to define successful promo tactics. Learned that I cannot work in an excel sheet all day and need to balance strategizing and planning with being in the field, engaging with people and working with products.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Coordinator - Product Promotions

profile_positions.description:
•	Achieved sustainable objectives within a tight-margin and fast-moving setting of a retailer by successful cross-functional project management between Procurement, Supply Chain, Marketing and external Suppliers.  Delhaize was as a result awarded the 2012 Greener Packaging Award and nominated for 2013 Greener Packaging Award.  
•	Managed development of on-pack communication to explain to consumers what the Delhaize Sustainable packaging strategy was about and how they could contribute by recycling correctly.
•	Set a new strategy in motion by giving impactful presentations to large groups as well as the C-suite
•	Scaled impact of material-reducing innovations by using data-driven prioritization. Result: 20% less packaging on the market for sliced ham.

Learned that I love to discover new product innovations and to partner with suppliers and internal stakeholders to bring them to the market. Learned that it excites me to have a strategic impact on a company and in society by actively contributing to a sustainable business model.
profile_positions.title: Sustainable Packaging Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Coordinated a portfolio of up to 80 cross-departmental projects at a time, achieving highest team completion rate in first 6 months from effective cross-functional relationships. 
•	On-boarded and coached 6 new team members
•	Managed creative development process from design brief. Successfully evaluated packaging designs to convey effective messages to consumers.
•	Change management: transitioned from product development spreadsheets and implemented online product lifecycle management tool to support the department’s private label packaging development, resulting in 1-month decrease of product time-to-market. 
•	Trained 150 employees/supplier users across the Buying, Design and Quality departments in the use of PLM software.

Loved working with designers and being involved in product development. Learned that I love working in a cross-functional setting and thinking about business process efficiencies. Learned how to ease the transition during change management projects by adopting a personal approach and transparent communication.
profile_positions.title: Packaging Project Specialist

profile_positions.description: Desk research and making kick-off presentation for a project on Maritime Spatial Planning for the EU Commission.
profile_positions.title: Research Trainee

volunteer_experiences.role: Preparing and Distributing Meals for Homeless People in Dallas
